title: Men's Baggy Jeans Y2K Streetwear Empyre Pants Wide Leg Hip Hop Extra Loose Fit Skater Denim Long Casual Trousers
description: BAGGY WIDE LEG：The various styles of QGRSWBC jeans mainly feature a loose wide leg cut, covering multiple styles such as Y2K, hip hop, Harajuku, and 1990s retro. They are combined with modern elements and have become a trendy choice for street wear.

SOFT MATERIAL：According to the specific style of the jeans, the most suitable fabrics are selected. The main component of the fabric is cotton, which makes the material soft, comfortable, and breathable. Polyester fiber is also added, further enhancing the abrasion resistance, durability, and ease of washing of the jeans, making them more suitable for wearing in all four seasons.

APPLICABLE OCCASIONS：They can be used for skateboarding, daily leisure, basketball, hiking, running, jogging, sports fitness, shopping, parties, outdoor activities, traveling, beach vacations, going out at night, theme parties, etc. They are also suitable for wearing in relatively formal occasions such as in the office. They are a great choice for various scenarios such as hip hop, street dance, dancing, sports, and daily life.

EASY TO MATCH：They can be paired with simple T-shirts, undershirts, vests, shirts, sweaters, outerwear, jackets, etc. Different combinations can create different styles, fully demonstrating a vibrant street fashion sense and a charming individual sense. It is a must-have pair of jeans in your wardrobe. Judge None, Chose One

CARE INSTRUCTIONS：Please read the size chart carefully before purchasing.if you are hesitant between two sizes, you can choose the larger one. Washing and Care: Most of them can be machine washed, but you need to pay attention to the methods, such as machine washing in cold water, separating colors when washing,and avoiding bleaching. If you have any suggestions regarding the jeans, you can feel free to contact us via email at any time.
